resource.name: Cancer Stage Group Profile
resource.description: An assessment of the extent of the cancer in the body, according to a given cancer staging classification system. This profile can be used with any staging system, but it is specifically targeted for non-TNM staging systems, since specialized TNM staging profiles are provided.

resource.name: Cancer Stage Group Value Set
resource.description: The result of cancer staging, i.e., the stage or category of the cancer.

resource.name: Cancer Staging Method Value Set
resource.description: System or method used for staging cancers. The terms in this value set describe staging systems, not specific stages or descriptors used within those systems.

resource.name: Cancer Staging Type Value Set
resource.description: Identifying codes for the type of cancer staging performed. In terms of the SNOMED CT hierarchy, these codes represent observables.

resource.name: TNM Distant Metastases Category Profile
resource.description: Category describing the extent of a tumor metastasis in remote anatomical locations, based on evidence such as physical examination, imaging, and/or biopsy.

resource.name: TNM Distant Metastases Category Value Set
resource.description: Result values for M category. This value set contains SNOMED-CT equivalents of UICC codes for the M category, according to TNM staging rules.

resource.name: TNM Distant Metastases Maximum Value Set
resource.description: Values for TNM distant metastases category must be selected from this value set, which includes all codes from UICC and all codes from TNMDistantMetastasesCategoryVS.

resource.name: TNM Distant Metastases Staging Type Value Set
resource.description: Identifying codes for the type of cancer staging performed, i.e., clinical, pathological, or other, for distant metastases (M) staging observation.

resource.name: TNM Primary Tumor Category Profile
resource.description: Category of the primary tumor, based on its size and extent, based on evidence such as physical examination, imaging, and/or biopsy.

resource.name: TNM Primary Tumor Category Value Set
resource.description: Result values for T category. This value set contains SNOMED-CT equivalents of UICC codes for the T category, according to TNM staging rules.

resource.name: TNM Primary Tumor Maximum Value Set
resource.description: Values for TNM primary tumor category must be selected from this value set, which includes all codes from UICC and all codes from TNMPrimaryTumorCategoryVS.

resource.name: TNM Primary Tumor Staging Type Value Set
resource.description: Identifying codes for the type of cancer staging performed, i.e., clinical, pathological, or other, for primary tumor (T) staging observation.

resource.name: TNM Regional Nodes Category Profile
resource.description: Category of the presence or absence of metastases in regional lymph nodes, based on evidence such as physical examination, imaging, and/or biopsy.

resource.name: TNM Regional Nodes Category Value Set
resource.description: Result values for N category. This value set contains SNOMED-CT equivalents of UICC codes for the N category, according to TNM staging rules.

resource.name: TNM Regional Nodes Maximum Value Set
resource.description: Values for TNM regional nodes category must be selected from this value set, which includes all codes from UICC and all codes from TNMRegionalNodesCategoryVS.

resource.name: TNM Regional Nodes Staging Type Value Set
resource.description: Identifying codes for the type of cancer staging performed, i.e., clinical, pathological, or other, for regional nodes (N) staging observation.

resource.name: TNM Stage Group Maximum Value Set
resource.description: Values for TNM stage group must be selected from this value set, which includes all codes from UICC and all codes from TNMStageGroupVS.

resource.name: TNM Stage Group Profile
resource.description: The extent of cancer represented by the stage group, based on a TNM staging system.

resource.name: TNM Stage Group Staging Type Value Set
resource.description: Identifying codes for the type of cancer staging performed, i.e., clinical, pathological, or other, for the stage group observation.

resource.name: TNM Stage Group Value Set
resource.description: Result values for cancer stage group using TNM staging. This value set contains SNOMED-CT equivalents of UICC codes for Stage Group, according to TNM staging rules.

resource.name: TNM Staging Method Value Set
resource.description: Method used for TNM staging, e.g., UICC 6th, 7th, or 8th edition.
